title: "OPTIMISE trial"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(rethinking)
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)

T<-quap(
  alist(
    y~dbinom(y+x, p), 
    p~dbeta(1,1)
  ),
  data=list(y=134, x=232)
)

C<-quap(
  alist(
    y~dbinom(y+x, p), 
    p~dbeta(1,1)
  ),
  data=list(y=158,x=206 )
)


Tpost<-extract.samples(T)
Cpost<-extract.samples(C)

RRpost<-Tpost/Cpost
```
